episodes.title: #9 Growing up in high-control systems and cults
episodes.description: In the first of their two conversations, Margareta Kull and Jackie Johnson explore courage under control. Jackie shares what it was like growing up in Jehovah’s Witnesses—loss, rules and scrutiny—and why one clear breaking point helped her finally leave. The next episode focuses on what leaders can learn. Interested in the Courageous Leader™ Process programme, you can find more information through the link provided here. If you’d like to get in touch with Jackie, please note that she has updated her email address since the recording of this episode. If you’d like to connect with her, feel free to reach out to us and we’ll be happy to pass your message along. This is the organization we’re talking about in the podcast. International Cultic Studies Association (ICSA) Follow Courageous Leader™ and Margareta Kull in social media @margaretakull
